articles.title: Google Trolls Apple Over iPhone 17 Design Rumors
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Google released a video featuring two talking phones, an iPhone and a Pixel, subtly pointing out how Apple's iPhone design has been influenced by Google's Pixel over the years. The video references features like Night Sight, Magic Eraser, and widgets, suggesting Apple adopted similar features later than Google.

articles.title: Instacart's New App Is Aiming for the Over-21 Party Crowd
articles.author: Kristyn Burtt
articles.summary: Instacart launched Fizz, a new app designed for users 21 and over, that focuses on snacks and drinks delivery with a $5 flat-fee. It allows users to invite guests to contribute to a shared cart, splitting the cost of party supplies from retailers like Kroger and Albertsons. The Fizz app is available on iOS and Android.

articles.title: More Power, More Convenience, Less Hassle: Roborock Expands Entry-Range Lineup
articles.summary: Roborock has expanded its Q Series with the launch of Q7T+, Q10V+, and Q7B robot vacuums in Australia, featuring HyperForce suction and tangle-free systems. Also, Roborock introduced its newest mid-range robot vacuum models to Australia and New Zealand: the Qrevo C and Qrevo L, with features like hair detangling and edge-to-edge mopping.

articles.title: Roborock Launches Qrevo Series in Australia and New Zealand, Bringing Premium Innovation to the Mid-Range Market
articles.summary: Roborock has launched its newest mid-range robot vacuum models, the Qrevo C and Qrevo L, in Australia and New Zealand. The Qrevo C features 12,000 Pa HyperForce® suction and a DuoDivide® Main Brush for hair detangling, while the Qrevo L offers 10,000 Pa HyperForce® suction and customizable water flow levels. Both models include features like obstacle avoidance and a multifunctional dock for hands-free maintenance and are available through Roborock's official retail channels.

articles.title: Divi Attorney Website: Quick Install – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Elegant Themes has launched Divi Quick Sites, a feature within the Divi Theme, that enables users to create fully functional websites within minutes using pre-designed templates or AI-generated designs. Divi Quick Sites offers easy customization, e-commerce integration with WooCommerce, and features like Theme Builder templates, global styles, and royalty-free images, catering to individuals and businesses seeking a quick and professional online presence.

articles.title: Mom Photo Booth, Pancakes, Fresh Flowers At MoCo Store For Mother's Day
articles.author: Deb Belt
articles.summary: Amazon Fresh is hosting free Mother's Day events featuring interactive pancake stations and a photo booth. Amazon Fresh and Whole Foods Market are offering deals on items like tulips, mains, sweets, and brunch essentials as well as discounts on body care and candles.

articles.title: 07.05.2025 00:59 новости на русском azərbaycan dilində Facebook Twitter Google+ RSS
articles.summary: Samsung SDI will exhibit its battery products designed for electric vehicles (EVs) and energy storage solutions at the upcoming Munich trade show.

articles.title: Aldi fans can get FREE beauty products weeks before they hit shelves from supermarket's popular dupe range – here's how
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi is offering ten cosmetic connoisseurs the opportunity to join its Beauty Club and influence the future of its Lacura beauty range. Selected members will receive upcoming summer beauty products before their official release and provide feedback that will shape Aldi's beauty product decisions for 2026. This initiative aims to create trend-led products that deliver value.

articles.title: Instacart Is Rolling Out a New Party App for Ordering Alcoholic Drinks and Snacks
articles.summary: Instacart is launching a new app called "Fizz" designed for party deliveries, focusing on snacks and alcoholic beverages. The app aims to combine alcohol delivery with party planning functionalities, differentiating it from previous services like Drizly.

articles.title: Google Rolls Out Improved AI Search Ad Options
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google is introducing 'AI Max for Search campaigns' to help advertisers better align with AI-guided queries and optimize ad placements. The process expands search keyword matches to relevant terms, potentially increasing conversions or conversion value, with advertisers seeing up to 27% uplift when using exact and phrase keywords. Additionally, Google is offering AI customizations for promotions, including text asset generation and final URL expansion, alongside new geographic and brand controls for AI Max campaigns.

articles.title: UGG is having a rare sale on the Classic Ultra Mini for 30% off, but sizes are selling fast
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: UGG is offering the Classic Ultra Mini boots, a popular style from their Classics collection, for $105 (originally $150). These boots feature signature sheepskin for warmth, an ultra-lightweight sole for comfort, a lower shaft height for easy wear, and are pre-treated to repel moisture and stains.

articles.title: HF Foods Group Inc. Rebrands and Launches Innovative E-Commerce Platform Dedicated to International Foodservice Solutions in the U.S.  May. 6, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: HF Foods Group Inc. has launched a new e-commerce platform to directly serve restaurant employees, expanding access to specialty products. The platform, initially launching in North Carolina, Florida, and Utah, utilizes existing delivery infrastructure. Along with the platform launch, HF Foods also debuted a new company logo and tagline.

articles.title: How to bag free Aldi skincare and makeup before it hits the shelves
articles.author: Niamh Kirk
articles.summary: Aldi is launching its Beauty Club 2025, offering select members early access to its upcoming Lacura Summer Beauty range before its full launch on June 5. This initiative allows beauty enthusiasts to trial and review products, influencing Aldi's beauty buy decisions for 2026.

articles.title: ServiceNow and Nvidia's new reasoning AI model raises the bar for enterprise AI agents
articles.summary: ServiceNow and Nvidia launched Apriel Nemotron 15B, a new open-source language model, during ServiceNow's Knowledge 2025 conference. The model is designed for lower latency, lower inference costs, and agentic AI, utilizing Nvidia Nemo, Nvidia Llama Nemotron Post-Training Dataset, and ServiceNow's domain-specific data.

articles.title: Inside OLIPOP's first-ever soda drive-thru in LA: Orange Cream is back
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: OLIPOP launched its Orange Cream flavor with a physical drive-thru experience in Los Angeles on May 12th and a virtual drive-thru event from May 12-19. These events include free mocktails, merchandise, and the chance to win prizes, alongside a 20% discount on all products using the promo code DRIVETHRU20.

articles.title: Instacart launches Fizz, a group ordering app for party drinks and snacks
articles.summary: Instacart is launching Fizz, a new standalone app designed for group ordering of snacks and drinks for parties. The app, developed with Partiful, allows partygoers in 30 U.S. states where alcohol delivery is legal to collaboratively order items for a flat $5 delivery fee.

articles.title: The real win of AI PCs? Battery life
articles.summary: Lenovo's ThinkPad T14s Gen 6, an AI PC, delivers nearly 24 hours of battery life on a single charge. This improvement is attributed to the new Neural Processing Units (NPU) inside Copilot+ PCs, which are more energy-efficient than traditional processors and optimized for AI tasks.

articles.title: Facing Mini and Smart: Nio's budget brand on its way to Israel
articles.author: KENAN COHEN
articles.summary: Nio, a Chinese car manufacturer, is launching a new brand called Firefly targeting the mainstream market segment. The Firefly is a supermini car featuring a 141 hp motor, a 42.1 kWh battery supporting battery swapping, and is expected to be available in Israel in the second half of 2025.

articles.title: Winston & Strawn Launches Secondaries and Liquidity Solutions Group
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Winston & Strawn has launched its Data Strategy Resource Center. This new resource center offers clients comprehensive advice on data monetization and emerging technology, focusing on data lifecycle issues. The Data Strategy Resource Center will help clients navigate data issues.

articles.title: According to my Facebook group, these 15 Amazon dresses are compliment magnets
articles.summary: Amazon is featuring a variety of dresses including the Qacohu V-Neck Dress, PrettyGarden Puff Sleeve Mini Dress, Merokeety Striped T Shirt Dress, and many others. These dresses cater to different styles, occasions, and body types, with shoppers praising their flattering fits, comfortable materials, and affordable prices, according to reviews.

articles.title: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16 review: Impressive visuals and power in one
articles.author: Taylor Sharpe
articles.summary: Asus is launching the 2025 Asus Zephyrus G16 laptop. The laptop is designed to provide the best experience for professionals balancing power and portability. The article details technical aspects and areas for improvement.

articles.title: ZTE launches four new Nubia phones in Oman
articles.author: OUR CORRESPONDENT
articles.summary: ZTE launched four new Nubia smartphone models (Nubia A35E, V70, V70 Design, V70 Max) in Oman, targeting diverse user needs with varying RAM, storage, and features such as AI-enhanced cameras and eye protection. The devices will be exclusively distributed by Marjan Phone through retail outlets and online platforms.

articles.title: IGNITE gets $1.6-million boost from province to help N.S. businesses grow
articles.author: Tina Comeau
articles.summary: IGNITE Atlantic, immediac, and Digital Nova Scotia launched 'novAI Labs: Everyday AI for Everyday Business' on May 5th. This initiative introduces small and medium-sized businesses to accessible AI tools designed to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and strengthen competitiveness. Workshops are scheduled across Nova Scotia to showcase AI tools and explore solutions for business challenges.

articles.title: IPhone Fold: 2 Key Advantages Over Galaxy Z Fold 7 – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Apple is rumored to be developing a foldable iPhone with a near-invisible crease and innovative liquid metal hinge, potentially launching in 2026 or 2027. The foldable iPhone is expected to have a 7.8-inch inner display and could feature a Touch ID power button, with a premium price point estimated between $2,000 and $2,500, positioning it as a competitor to Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold series.

articles.title: StackAdapt Launches Integrated Email and Data Hub, Bridging Martech and Programmatic Advertising Under One Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: StackAdapt launches a unified adtech and martech platform that combines programmatic advertising and email marketing. This AI-driven platform offers a 360-degree view of the customer journey, enabling marketers to optimize campaigns and achieve measurable results. The platform aims to connect marketing activation, measurement, and messaging for high-performance campaigns.

articles.title: ServiceNow Reimagines CRM for the AI Era to Sell, Fulfill, and Service on One Unified Platform Providing Exceptional End-to-End Experiences
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ServiceNow unveiled its next-generation AI-powered CRM at Knowledge 2025, designed to sell, fulfill, and service on one unified platform. The new CRM orchestrates work across departments and includes new AI agents that can complete tasks autonomously, scale call centers, and enhance self-service.

articles.title: ServiceNow Unveils the New ServiceNow AI Platform to Put Any AI, Any Agent, Any Model to Work Across the Enterprise
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ServiceNow launched the ServiceNow AI Platform, designed to unify intelligence, data, and orchestration across the business. The platform includes integrations with partners like Microsoft, NVIDIA, Google, and Oracle. Global leaders like Adobe, Aptiv, the NHL, Visa, and Wells Fargo are already using the platform.

articles.title: Tide Cleaners Marks Milestone with 20th South Florida Location in Boynton Beach
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Tide Cleaners is opening a new full-service dry cleaning store in Boynton Beach, marking its 20th location in South Florida. This expansion represents the introduction of Tide Cleaners' services to a new geographic area.

articles.title: Soda drive-through will offer free internet famous drinks on May 12
articles.author: Richard Guzman
articles.summary: Olipop, a soda company, is launching its new Orange Cream flavor and organizing a free pop-up drive-through event in Los Angeles on May 12. The event will feature recreations of viral internet drinks, including the Orange Cream soda, along with free merchandise giveaways in partnership with Crocs.

articles.title: Instacart's new Fizz alcohol delivery app is aimed at Gen Z
articles.summary: Instacart launched Fizz, a new app focused on alcohol and snack delivery, targeting Gen Z users. This app is intended to complement Instacart's core grocery delivery business by catering to a younger, price-conscious demographic with features designed for group orders and party snacks.

articles.title: Get 50GB data for completely free with this no-strings Vodafone trial
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Vodafone is offering a free one-week trial to non-customers in London, providing 50GB of data, 500 minutes, and 500 texts. The trial is activated via eSIM through the My Vodafone app or by scanning a QR code, allowing users to test Vodafone's network without commitment. Vodafone plans to expand this scheme to other UK cities and events.

articles.title: SonicWall Redefines Cybersecurity, Sets New Standard with Next Generation Network Security Solutions Built for MSPs  May. 6, 2025 16:05
articles.summary: SonicWall has launched a suite of new products and services aimed at Managed Service Providers (MSPs), featuring next-generation firewalls (NGFW) and Managed Protection Security Services (MPSS). The new offerings are delivered through the unified, cloud-native SonicPlatform. The company also introduced Gen 8 Firewalls (NSa 2800/3800) and Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) as well as enhanced support and an industry-first cyber warranty with Cysurance.

articles.title: Albertsons expands ecommerce platform to 2,000 stores nationwide
articles.summary: Albertsons Companies Inc. has expanded its eCommerce platform to over 2,000 locations across its various banners, offering a full-service shopping experience for businesses. This platform provides essential items such as snacks, beverages, and cleaning products with features like same-day delivery, flexible payment options, and no minimum order requirements.

articles.title: The Ordinary has relaunched its divisive SPF, so I put it to the test
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: The Ordinary has relaunched its face SPF in an ultralight serum after two years. The new chemical sunscreen uses five different types of organic UV filters and includes ingredients like glycerin and vitamin E. The SPF 45 serum was tested extensively before its public launch on May 6.

articles.title: Why some innovations fail in Nigeria (and others thrive)
articles.author: Ifedolapo Ojuade
articles.summary: The article highlights several companies like Jumia, Uber, Bolt, Peak Milk, MTN, and Slot and their strategic approaches to launching or adapting products/services in Nigeria. Jumia initially stumbled before adapting to pay-on-delivery, while Uber initially struggled before incorporating cash payments, which Bolt quickly adapted to. MTN's Village Phone initiative and Slot's high-touch retail approach demonstrate successful adaptation to local norms.

articles.title: Team Clean N' Go Powerwashing Takes First Place at StartUp Showcase
articles.author: Nancy Sasso Janis
articles.summary: Clean N' Go Powerwashing, a cleaning service for residential and commercial customers, won first place at the Fairfield StartUp Showcase and received $12.5K in seed funding. MiniMinds, which developed an AI-powered learning disability diagnostic tool, won both the Audience Favorite Award and the Societal Impact Award. The teams showcased their business ideas to an investor panel comprised of alumni, business experts, and C-suite executives.

articles.title: We're in a New Age of Quick-Dry Nail Polish. But They're Not All Created Equal.
articles.summary: OPI RapiDry polish stood out for its lasting color and broad color range. Olive & June Quick Dry manicure held up well over a week and offers a wide range of colors, but requires two coats of polish, plus a top coat. Dazzle Dry offers a long-lasting, salon-quality manicure with smooth, saturated pigments and salon-quality shine, with a variety of cream and shimmer shades.

articles.title: Ooredoo unveils GPT-4o-powered AI chatbot ‘Obot' across key customer channels
articles.summary: Ooredoo has launched 'Obot,' an AI chatbot powered by GPT-4o, to enhance customer engagement across its app, website, and soon, WhatsApp and social media. Obot offers personalized assistance, product recommendations, and data-driven insights, aiming to redefine customer service and user experience by providing human-like interactions and tailored responses.

articles.title: Inside Spring's Best Fashion and Beauty Events
articles.summary: Louis Vuitton launched its new product, LV Sneakerina, a hybrid design between a sneaker and ballet flat. Marc Jacobs debuted its new fragrance, Daisy Wild Eau So Intense, at Virginia Robinson Gardens. GUESS celebrated the launch of its Spring 2025 women's collection with a luncheon hosted by Mary Bonnet. SKIMS opened its first Los Angeles flagship store and launched a pop-up experience. Paris Hilton Fragrances launched ICONIC Eau de Parfum and partnered with Ulta Beauty. CHANEL marked the launch of CHANCE EAU SPLENDIDE, the newest fragrance in the CHANCE collection.

articles.title: Motoring: MG ups its game with new S5 electric SUV
articles.author: James Fossdyke
articles.summary: A company replaced its ZS EV model with the larger S5 EV. The new S5 EV is intended to build on the success of its predecessor, the ZS EV.

articles.title: Popeyes Louisiana Chicken officially opens Cape Breton location
articles.author: Ian Nathanson
articles.summary: Popeyes Louisiana Chicken has launched a new franchise location in Sydney, Nova Scotia, on Grand Lake Road. The grand opening on May 6, 2025, drew significant customer interest. Keel Brands Limited, the franchisee, sees Sydney as a substantial market and aims to grow the Popeyes brand.

articles.title: Just $1? Yes, this universally flattering lipstick is only a buck
articles.summary: Wet n Wild Silk Finish Lipstick is available for $1 and is praised for its flattering color, hydrating formula with vitamins A & E, macadamia nut oil, and aloe vera. E.l.f. Sheer Slick Lipstick is highlighted as an affordable alternative to Clinique Black Honey, noted for its similar texture, staying power, and hue.

articles.title: Instacart debuts ‘Fizz' alcohol ordering app to target Gen Z users
articles.author: Natalie Lung
articles.summary: Instacart is launching Fizz, a new app aimed at Gen-Z, facilitating group orders of drinks and snacks with a flat $5 delivery fee. Fizz includes a rewards program called 'Snack Bucks' and partnerships to attract younger users and complement Instacart's core business. The company intends to drive growth by offering a lower price point and attracting alcohol brands for marketing.

articles.title: Amazon launches new shopping service to rival Temu and Shein
articles.author: Sam Walker
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new shopping service called "Haul" in the UK, offering thousands of products for £20 or less. Haul is available via smartphone and aims to provide low-priced options, competing with rivals like Temu and Shein. The service offers free delivery on orders over £15 and an extra 5% off for orders exceeding £50.

articles.title: New Turkish armored scout debuts in Spain
articles.summary: Turkish defense company FNSS is debuting its new-generation PARS ALPHA 6x6 Fire Support and Reconnaissance Vehicle at Spain's FEINDEF 2025 exhibition in Madrid. The conceptual design will be displayed integrated with the Cockerill 3030 manned turret, featuring a 30mm MK44S Bushmaster cannon. The vehicle is designed to provide fire support and conduct reconnaissance missions.

articles.title: McDonald's announces new menu items - but only for a limited time
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
articles.summary: McDonald's UK is introducing new menu items, including the Frozen Cherry Lemonade, the Breakfast Saver Menu featuring items like the Sausage Sandwich and Saver Bacon Roll, and the return of the McSpicy X Frank's RedHot burger with a Frank's RedHot Mayo dip. These new and returning items are available for a limited time at McDonald's locations across the UK.

articles.title: Korl launches platform orchestrating AI agents from OpenAI, Gemini and Anthropic to hyper-customize customer messaging
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Korl launched a new AI platform that integrates data from multiple systems to create customized customer communications. The platform uses models from OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic to generate personalized materials such as QBRs, renewal pitches, and tailored presentations.

articles.title: 43 People Share The Most Excessively Lazy Thing They've Ever Done
articles.summary: A user story reveals that someone bought a new Frank Green water bottle annually due to being too lazy to clean the existing one. This implies the user purchased a new product instead of maintaining the old one.

articles.title: Coupang introduces English app for foreign customers
articles.author: 김현수
articles.summary: Coupang, Inc. launched an English interface for its mobile app to better serve foreign customers. The new interface allows users to access key features like product search, order information, and payment in English, along with services like Rocket Delivery and Gold Box.

articles.title: Primark's 'flattering' new teal sports jacket 'looks like lululemon'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new range of colourful gymwear, including sports jackets, T-shirts, and shorts. The range features new colors and styles, with a teal sports jacket being a popular item. Some jackets are available for click and collect on Primark's website, such as the £12 Seamless Zip-Up Sport Jacket and the £40 Hooded Sports Jacket.

articles.title: A Mission to Empower: Slick Chicks aims to make every day dressing easier
articles.author: Daisha Jones
articles.summary: Slick Chicks, an apparel company focused on accessibility, offers clothing designed to empower individuals with limited mobility. Their product is now available in CVS stores, expanding its reach and accessibility.

articles.title: CLIMATE FRIENDLY
articles.summary: Nippon Paint launched a new paint series in Quezon City on May 6, 2025. The innovative paint provides enhanced protection, offering heat reduction, dirt resistance, and defense against climate threats.

articles.title: Amazon to roll out low-cost Haul service in the UK
articles.author: Henry Saker-Clark
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new shopping service called 'Haul' in the UK, capping product prices at £20 to compete with low-cost rivals. Currently in beta testing for select customers, Haul offers thousands of products for £20 or less, with free delivery on orders over £15.

articles.title: Sky's epic new deal where a Samsung Galaxy tablet costs just £3 a month
articles.summary: Sky is offering the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 for £3 a month under a 48-month contract, with an option to swap the device after 36 months. The tablet features a vibrant display, up to 4GB of RAM, and 64GB of expandable storage. The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 is presented as a budget-friendly option for users.

articles.title: Instacart launches Fizz, a group ordering app for party drinks and snacks
articles.author: Jessica Bursztynsky
articles.summary: Instacart is launching Fizz, a new stand-alone app, allowing groups to order snacks and drinks for parties with a flat $5 delivery fee. Developed with Partiful, the platform enables users in 30 U.S. states with legal alcohol delivery to contribute items to a shared cart from participating grocery stores, each paying only for their additions.

articles.title: AI Upgrades Come to Search Ad Campaigns With Google's New AI Max
articles.author: Kendra Barnett
articles.summary: Google has launched AI Max for Search, a new suite of AI-driven tools aimed at improving search ad campaigns by using predictive capabilities to anticipate user intent. The suite includes features like enhanced search term matching and asset optimization using Gemini to create more relevant ad content. Early testing showed an average lift of 14% in conversions or conversion value using AI Max for Search.

articles.title: Instacart invites itself to the party with new group-ordering delivery app
articles.author: Catherine Douglas Moran
articles.summary: Instacart has launched Fizz, a new app for group-ordering and delivery of snacks and drinks, targeting users 21 and older. Fizz features a $5 flat delivery fee, group ordering, and automatic payment splitting, and it integrates with platforms like Partiful. New users receive $5 in Snack Bucks, which can be used for discounts.

articles.title: Instacart launches Fizz, a new app for ordering drinks and snacks for parties
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Instacart has launched Fizz, a new drinks and snack delivery app targeted at group ordering for parties and get-togethers. The app allows hosts to create a shared cart where guests can add items and pay individually, eliminating the need for bill splitting. It diversifies Instacart's revenue streams and appeals to a younger demographic.

articles.title: Bakcell mobile app enters the era of AI-powered offers
articles.summary: Bakcell has introduced new personalized offers in its mobile application using artificial intelligence (AI) to analyze user habits and tailor campaigns and tariff plans. These customized offers, generated through behavioural analysis, are delivered to users as notifications. This enables customers to optimize their time and benefit from offers specifically designed for them.

articles.title: Coupang to roll out English service, beta version already available
articles.author: KIM MIN-YOUNG
articles.summary: Coupang is launching an English version of its online shopping app to cater to English speakers in Korea. The English interface includes product searches, order details, purchase pages, and membership benefits. Services like Rocket Delivery, overseas deliveries, and daily discounts are also available in English within the app.

articles.title: Израел: Газа ще бъде напълно унищожена
articles.summary: Bharti Airtel launched 'Business Name Display' (BND), a service enabling companies to show their brand name on customer phones during calls. A pilot program with 250 businesses making 12.8 million calls resulted in increased customer engagement. The service aims to build trust and prevent confusion with spam calls.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret's swimwear looks similar to designer brand with a much cheaper price
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched the 'Dream On Blue Crinkle Bikini', made from textured scrunch fabric, priced at £53. The company offers the universally flattering crinkle style as part of the new collection.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret's swimwear looks similar to designer brand with a much cheaper price
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched a new swimsuit range featuring crinkle-style fabric, offering a more affordable alternative to Hunza G. The collection includes the Dream On bikini, crafted from ultra-stretchy textured scrunch fabric, and a one-piece swimsuit, with prices significantly lower than Hunza G's products.

articles.title: Ghosting or Roasting ?
articles.author: Samriti Dhatwalia
articles.summary: Tinder has launched a new chatbot interface, 'The Game Game', aimed at improving users' flirting skills. Infiheal, India has developed Healo, an AI for therapy.

articles.title: Ascential Technologies Introduces Expanded Customer Service Program: Ascential Care
articles.author: Ascential Technologies
articles.summary: Ascential Technologies launched Ascential Care, a customer service platform. The platform enhances customer experience and ensures lifetime value for customers' equipment and automation technologies. It positions Ascential Technologies to adapt swiftly and meet evolving customer needs.

articles.title: Aldi on the hunt for influencers to review new Lacura beauty range
articles.author: Saiqa Chaudhari
articles.summary: Aldi is launching its new Lacura summer beauty range in June and is seeking influencers to review the products beforehand. Selected members of Aldi's Beauty Club 2025 will receive products from the upcoming Summer Beauty range before its full release on Thursday, June 5. Aldi is also launching a new handheld steamer in the Specialbuys aisle.

articles.title: HF Foods Group Inc. Rebrands and Launches Innovative E-Commerce Platform Dedicated to International Foodservice Solutions in the U.S.
articles.author: Hf Foods Group Inc.
articles.summary: HF Foods Group Inc. launched a new e-commerce platform to directly serve restaurant employees alongside existing restaurant deliveries. The company also debuted a refreshed logo and a tagline 'Specialty Food is Our Specialty'. Initially, the e-commerce platform will be launched at North Carolina, Florida and Utah locations.

articles.title: I picked five New Look dresses for under £30 each for the heatwave
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: New Look is introducing five new dresses to its spring wardrobe collection, including a Pink Striped Wrap Midi Dress, a Black Floral Print Sweetheart Neck Mini Dress, a Red Crinkled Texture Tie Front Mini Dress, a Dark Khaki Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, and a Green Textured Belted Tiered Shirt Dress. Each dress features unique designs and materials, catering to different styles and preferences for the warmer seasons.

articles.title: I tested the $13 multitool that everyone's buying these days. Here's my verdict
articles.summary: Amazon Basics launched the 15-in-1 stainless steel multitool, priced at $13 on Amazon. This multitool includes features such as a knife, saw, fish scaler, and various other tools. It targets users looking for a budget-friendly and versatile tool.

articles.title: Zoho's low-code platform offers gains for businesses
articles.author: Folake Balogun
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation has launched new services and features within Zoho Creator, including the AI assistant CoCreator. CoCreator facilitates faster app building through voice and written prompts. The Idea-to-App Generation feature allows businesses to develop full-fledged applications using ZohoAI or OpenAI.

articles.title: Asos has made a huge change to deliveries after hiking fees – and it's good news for shoppers
articles.author: James Flanders
articles.summary: ASOS has updated its next-day delivery service by extending the cut-off time for orders from 7pm back to 9pm, allowing customers two extra hours to shop.  This change reverses a previous adjustment made several weeks prior due to high order volumes, and aims to improve the customer experience.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge to Launch on May 13; Specifications and Price Leaked
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge, featuring a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and a 200MP primary camera. Expected to start at €1,249, the phone will be available in Titanium Jet Black, Titanium Icy Blue, and Titanium Silver, with an initial launch in Korea and China around May 23.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Leaks: Release Date, Price, Design, Camera, Colors, Specifications And More, All You Need To Know
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to launch the OnePlus Nord 5 in June or July 2025, succeeding the Nord 4. The Nord 5 will have a 6,650mAh battery with 80W charging, MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset, a 50MP main camera, and a 1.5K 120Hz OLED display. The price is rumored to be around Rs 30,000.

articles.title: Lunchables Transforms a Lunchtime Classic with First-Ever Dippable, No-Thaw Crustless PB&J
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lunchables has launched a new product called Lunchables PB&J, a dippable, no-thaw crustless PB&J. Each pack contains two crustless peanut butter sandwiches and a side of grape or strawberry flavored dip.

articles.title: I went to UK's best M&S & was amazed by the fashion but look out for tricks used to make you stay longer & spend more
articles.author: Deputy Fashion Editor
articles.summary: M&S opened a new standalone clothing store in Battersea Power Station featuring a curated selection of fashion items. The store offers a unique shopping experience with special features like cream fabric hangers and canvas bags. Upcoming collections will include leopard print dresses, colourful co-ords, and embroidered boho jackets.

articles.title: PrintVolution Unveils Revamped Website, Redefining Custom Printing Services in Singapore
articles.author: Evertise
articles.summary: PrintVolution has launched its newly revamped website to provide a modernized user experience with high-quality, customizable print solutions. The updated platform introduces a sleek interface, streamlined navigation, an integrated design preview tool and expanded product offerings like sticker and name card printing. The checkout process is refined, and the website now features an updated blog section and a dedicated customer service portal.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 set to launch in India soon: Features, price and more
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch its new smartphone, the iQOO Neo 10, in India. The device is expected to feature a 6.78-inch FHD+ 1.5K AMOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a 50MP Sony LYT-600 primary sensor, and will be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset paired with a 7,000mAh battery supporting 120W fast charging.

articles.title: 7 Best Sunscreens That Do Not Leave a White Cast on Indian Skin
articles.author: Purva Joshi
articles.summary: Several sunscreens formulated for Indian skin tones are highlighted, each offering specific benefits such as broad-spectrum protection, non-comedogenic properties, or suitability for different skin types (oily, dry, acne-prone). These sunscreens feature various formulations, including mineral, chemical, and hybrid options, often enriched with ingredients like vitamin C, rice extract, or niacinamide to enhance skin glow, hydration, or UV protection.

articles.title: Cleaning fans rave over £3 ‘liquid gold' M&S buy that instantly removes stains – & mums say it's ‘the best' when weaning
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: M&S launched a Fabric Stain Remover that is available for purchase. The product is praised for removing stains from clothes, especially during weaning. It is available at Ocado for £3.

articles.title: Cleaning fans rave over £3 ‘liquid gold' M&S buy that instantly removes stains – & mums say it's ‘the best' when weaning
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: M&S launched a new Fabric Stain Remover, priced at £3 and available at Ocado. This stain remover contains plant-based biodegradable ingredients, is cruelty-free, and suitable for vegans. Users on social media have praised its effectiveness, referring to it as 'liquid gold' for its ability to remove tough stains from clothing.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro sale date is out: Newly launched smartphone will be at up to 20% discount, along with other benefits
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Pro in India, with sales starting on May 7, 2025, and is available on Flipkart and leading retail stores. The smartphone features a 6.7-inch Super HD display, up to 12GB of RAM, 256GB of storage, a triple camera system, and a 6,000mAh battery, with prices starting at INR 29,999.

articles.title: Skincare shoppers can't live without 'staple' anti-ageing cream that smooths wrinkles overnight
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Caudalie has introduced Resveratrol-Lift Firming Night Cream, featuring Vegan Collagen 1 and anti-aging patents designed to smooth wrinkles and firm skin overnight. La Roche-Posay offers the Nutritic Intense Rich Cream as an alternative for sensitive skin, aiming to soothe and reinforce the skin's natural barrier.

articles.title: Smart Textiles Market Size, Share, Trends, Report Analysis, and Forecast, 2032
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: The smart textiles market report covers key companies including Adidas AG, EXO2, Gentherm, Inc., DuPont, Nike, Inc., Ohmatex ApS, and Sensing Tex SL. These companies are significant players in the smart textiles market.

articles.title: Trade 350 App Real Or Fake-{VISIT THE OFFICIAL WEBSITE}-Unlocking Financial Knowledge with Trade 350 App!
articles.summary: Trade350 App has launched a trading platform that offers advanced features, an intuitive user interface, and robust security. The app provides real-time market insights, AI-powered predictive analytics, and customizable alert systems to empower traders in making informed decisions. It also offers seamless trading across devices and integration with financial tools, aimed at optimizing trading strategies and maximizing returns.

articles.title: Trade 350 App Trading Review-{AVAILABLE IN AUSTRALIA}-Trade 350 App: Simplifying Your Journey to Financial Freedom!
articles.summary: The Trade350 App is introduced as a new digital trading platform with innovative features, including AI-powered market analysis tools, automated trading strategies, and customizable risk management systems. It offers multi-asset trading capabilities and is designed for traders of all levels, with a user-friendly interface and mobile optimization.

articles.title: Realme GT 10,000mAh Concept Phone Revealed With Massive Battery and New Design
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Realme has revealed a concept smartphone, the Realme GT 10,000mAh, featuring a large 10,000mAh battery and a new design camera module. To accommodate the large battery, Realme is reportedly using an ultra-high silicon-content anode battery and a special internal layout called the 'Mini Diamond Architecture'.

articles.title: Multimodal AI makes this robot vacuum cleaner smart enough to pick up your socks
articles.author: Roborock
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the Saros Z70, a robot vacuum cleaner featuring an OmniGrip intelligent, foldable robotic arm. The Saros Z70 uses multimodal AI and sensors to navigate, identify objects, and adapt to changing home environments, enabling it to clean and organize homes. The device is voice-activated and can also be used to monitor pets.

articles.title: Google launches new film, TV initiative to promote its products
articles.summary: Google is pushing its newer tech products and services, including Immersive View and spatial tools, through the 100 Zeros initiative. The company aims to improve its image among the youth by promoting a positive perception of its products through entertainment and influencing pop culture.

articles.title: SonicWall Redefines Cybersecurity, Sets New Standard with Next Generation Network Security Solutions Built for MSPs
articles.author: Sonic Wall
articles.summary: SonicWall launched new next-generation mid-range and high-end firewalls (NGFW), Managed Protection Security Services (MPSS) Firewall Management with 24/7 monitoring and a unified, cloud-native SonicPlatform, designed for Managed Service Providers (MSPs) and their customers.  These offerings aim to provide end-to-end cyber protection and facilitate profitable service expansion, including a cyber warranty.

articles.title: SonicWall Redefines Cybersecurity, Sets New Standard with Next Generation Network Security Solutions Built for MSPs
articles.author: Media Out Reach Newswire
articles.summary: SonicWall launched a suite of new products and services including next-generation firewalls (NGFW) and Managed Protection Security Services (MPSS). These offerings are designed to empower Managed Service Providers (MSPs) by providing end-to-end cyber protection and scalable, cost-effective solutions for their customers. The new services also include SonicSentry and SonicPlatform.

articles.title: Goodbye human drivers? Waymo's robotaxis are now fully operational
articles.author: vsingh
articles.summary: Waymo has achieved full commercial deployment of its robotaxi service, allowing users to summon a taxi via their phones.

articles.title: Google Testing Samsung DeX-Like Desktop Mode for Phones with Android 16 — The Kashmir Monitor
articles.author: Monitor News Desk
articles.summary: Google is planning to introduce a new desktop-style experience for Android smartphones with the release of Android 16. The new feature, discovered in Android 16 Beta 4, enables a taskbar, three-button navigation, and floating app windows when a Pixel phone is connected to an external display, extending functionality previously seen on the Pixel Tablet to smartphones.

articles.title: Professional LinkedIn Marketing Services by Innovate Marketers
articles.summary: Innovate Marketers, a LinkedIn marketing agency, offers data-backed strategies to help B2B businesses grow. Their services include LinkedIn ad campaign management, B2B lead generation, profile optimization, content planning, and performance tracking.

articles.title: Alibaba offers 100 million free drinks as instant delivery orders reach 10 million per day
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: Alibaba Group Holding launched its Taobao Instant Commerce service on April 30, achieving 10 million daily orders shortly after launch. The service offers users of Taobao 100 million free drinks, including milk tea and coffee. This positions Alibaba as a new entrant in the competitive instant commerce market, utilizing its Ele.me food delivery couriers.

articles.title: realme's latest concept GT 7 with a 10,000 mAh battery is a power bank killer smartphone
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Realme unveiled a concept phone that may become the first mainstream smartphone with a 10,000 mAh battery. The concept phone is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chip and runs on Android 15-based realme UI 4. A phone featuring the 10,000 mAh battery will launch in India under the GT 7 branding.

articles.title: Zuckerberg says AI could ‘redefine' Meta's ad business
articles.summary: NLB Services is launching a new venture focused on Marketing-as-a-Service. This new service aims to replace bloated retainers and fragmented teams. The Marketing-as-a-Service model is modular, measurable, and built for scalability.

articles.title: Is there more to adland's talent crisis than we think?
articles.summary: NLB Services is launching a new "Marketing-as-a-Service" venture. This model is designed to be modular, measurable, and scalable, aiming to overcome challenges like bloated retainers and fragmented teams.

articles.title: Forget the Galaxy S25, Samsung confirms something 'light years ahead' is coming soon
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new 'category-defining' smartphone, likely the Galaxy S25 Edge. This razor-thin phone, measuring just 5.8mm thick, features a dual-lens camera, all-metal design, and a 6.6-inch screen, with expectations of a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. Samsung is offering a £100 discount for customers who pre-order the device with a refundable £50 deposit.

articles.title: Samsung to Open Galaxy AI-Driven Pop-Up Restaurant in Portugal
articles.author: Defara Dhanya
articles.summary: Samsung is launching a pop-up restaurant, Sem Igual, in Portugal, leveraging Galaxy AI technology from the Galaxy S25 series to create AI-generated recipes. Customers will use the Galaxy S25 to photograph ingredients, which Galaxy AI will then process to generate unique recipes prepared by a professional chef. The restaurant will operate in Lisbon and Porto on specific dates in May 2025 as a promotional campaign for Galaxy AI.

articles.title: JOLT Phone App Gains Ground as Gen Z and Millennials Redefine Android Call Customization
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: JOLT offers a personalized dialer experience for Android with style, utility, and smart call features. The dialer app has been downloaded over 1 million times.

articles.title: Savour The Summer At Yi Jing, ITC Kohenur
articles.author: Dc Correspondent
articles.summary: Yi Jing restaurant introduces "Savour the Summer," an exclusive lunch experience featuring a curated menu of dim sums, mains, and desserts with unlimited premium beverages. Available only during lunchtime, the offering is priced at ₹2500++ for food with beverage options at ₹500++ per person.

articles.title: LG U+ announced on the 6th that its platform for affordable phones, "Aldot," exceeded 300,000 subscr..
articles.author: A Prescription
articles.summary: LG U+ announced that its affordable phone platform, Aldot, exceeded 300,000 subscribers within a year of its launch and introduced 'Aldot Care,' a service for managing subscription information and data usage. To commemorate Aldot's first anniversary, LG U+ will add self-application functions for additional services and strengthen the Aldot care function.

articles.title: Krysstal Faucets: Redefining Modern Bathrooms with Luxury, Innovation & Sustainability
articles.summary: Krysstal is revolutionizing home spaces with its designer bathroom and kitchen accessories. The company is launching new products such as the KRYSSTAL Health Faucet with a magnetic holder and no-drill mount, the Oceanus Smart Shower Panel with multiple functions, and the PureFlow Hard Water Filter for water conservation.

articles.title: HSAD, an advertising agency affiliated with LG, is developing an employee experience (EX) consulting..
articles.author: Jung Seung Hwan
articles.summary: HSAD, an advertising agency affiliated with LG, is launching an employee experience (EX) consulting business, exemplified by the 'Connectwin' project at LG Twin Towers.  This new service aims to improve employee satisfaction and corporate culture by creating experience-focused workspaces. HSAD intends to expand this EX business based on the success of the LG Twin Towers Connectwin initiative.

articles.title: Avanti Finance Rebrand Signals Ambitious Growth Agenda
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: The company invests in new product development and enhances the service experience as part of a broader transformation.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 India launch confirmed: Expected to debut with dual rear cameras, Android 15 OS, 16MP front camera, 7,000mAh battery, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch the iQOO Neo 10 smartphone in India, featuring a dual-tone design and a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset. The device is expected to have a 6.78-inch Full HD+ AMOLED 144Hz display, a 50MP + 8MP dual-camera configuration, and a 7,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging. The phone is expected to be available on Amazon and iQOO's website.

articles.title: Cook Different: Matty Matheson and Gozney Mark 10 Years with Bold New Campaign
articles.author: Apac Ad Junkie
articles.summary: Gozney has launched a new global advertising campaign, 'Cook Different,' featuring Matty Matheson, to promote Gozney pizza ovens. The campaign includes Matheson sharing his favorite meals and recipes to cook on Gozney ovens, and will be shown across consumer touchpoints in CTV channels, select live sporting events and TV shows.

articles.title: NEXCOM Enhances Smart Retail Operations with the Versatile Neu-X104
articles.summary: NEXCOM has launched the Neu-X104, a compact, high-performance self-service kiosk solution for the retail industry. The Neu-X104 offers faster data transfer speeds and is equipped with Wi-Fi 7, designed for contactless customer experiences and AI-powered smart retail environments. It targets reducing wait times and improving data retrieval efficiency.

articles.title: Watch: Volkswagen camper van pop-slide roof explodes interior space
articles.author: New Atlas
articles.summary: Tonke has introduced a new pop-up camper roof for the Volkswagen ID. Buzz. A video released this month demonstrates the functionality of this new product.

articles.title: MG Windsor Pro launch today. Price, new features, battery, all important details
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: MG is launching the Windsor Pro, with information available regarding its price, new features, and battery specifications.

articles.title: Google accidentally reveals details about its new Android design language, Material 3 Expressive
articles.author: Crunch
articles.summary: Google will unveil a new version of its Android design language. The unveiling will occur at the upcoming Google I/O developer conference.

articles.title: 5 Rules All Innovative, High-Agency Minds Follow
articles.author: David Henkin
articles.summary: The article highlights the rise of high-agency individuals and teams leveraging AI and other tools to build and launch new products and companies. Examples include Spanx's innovative approach to product development, SpaceX and Tesla's use of deep knowledge and action, Pixar's collaborative innovation, and LinkedIn's rapid iteration. The article predicts a surge of AI-native companies that are lean, hyper-personalized, and globally scalable.

articles.title: MuleSoft Formulates Mix For Galvanized Agentic AI Connections
articles.author: Adrian Bridgwater
articles.summary: MuleSoft is extending its platform with agentic AI-facing technologies, including support for Model Context Protocol (MCP) in Beta. This allows for integration between language model applications and external data, services, and tools. The company also highlights its Agentforce capabilities, aimed at enabling more complex actions with AI agents.

articles.title: Enterprise Brands: How Agentic AI Is Reimagining Performance Marketing
articles.summary: Google Shopping, in partnership with Addition, launched hyper-personalized out-of-home ads in New York City using an intelligent creative pipeline and AI. Puma, with digital agency Monks, debuted an AI-driven production pipeline to create a 30-second video campaign adapted for global markets, presented at Nvidia's GPU Technology Conference.

articles.title: Microsoft Photos Can Relight Your Images
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Microsoft announced new features for Windows 11 as part of the next wave of Windows experiences. This announcement signals an update to the Windows 11 operating system.

articles.title: Amazon Slashes Price on Roborock Q5 Max+ Robot Vacuum by Over 50% Just in Time ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Roborock features its cleaning robot which cleans the whole house.

articles.title: Ooredoo unveils GPT-4o-powered AI chatbot ‘Obot' across key customer channels
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Ooredoo launched 'Obot', an AI chatbot powered by GPT-4o. This chatbot is now accessible on the Ooredoo App and website. Ooredoo plans to expand Obot to WhatsApp and social media for seamless customer assistance.

articles.title: Meet Israel's AI video model ‘Sora': Lightricks unveils its answer to OpenAI and Google
articles.author: system
articles.summary: A startup launched LTX Video-13B model. The model features 13 billion parameters and breakthrough compression. This launch aims to compete with tech giants in AI-generated video.

articles.title: This 3-in-1 Tamagotchi plushie stole the show at Toy Fair 2025
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Tamagotchi is launching a new 'Adventure Companion' backpack.

articles.title: Organizing the Opposition
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Google is hosting 'The Android Show' ahead of Google I/O 2025. The event is expected to reveal new information about Android related products or services.

articles.title: Buried in Laundry: Poplin comes to the rescue
articles.author: Karen Schaffner
articles.summary: Poplin, a new laundry service, has launched, offering a convenient solution where users can schedule laundry pick-up via an app, and a professional washes, folds, and returns it. The service aims to transform laundry into a gig economy opportunity for stay-at-home individuals and offer an alternative to those burdened or at risk while doing laundry themselves.
